Ivern.name: Ivern
Ivern.title: the Green Father
Ivern.lore: Ivern Bramblefoot, known to many as the Green Father, is a peculiar half man, half tree who roams Runeterra's forests, cultivating life everywhere he goes. He knows the secrets of the natural world, and holds deep friendships with all things that grow, fly, and scuttle. Ivern wanders the wilderness, imparting strange wisdom to any he meets, enriching the forests, and occasionally entrusting loose-lipped butterflies with his secrets.
Ivern.blurb: Ivern Bramblefoot, known to many as the Green Father, is a peculiar half man, half tree who roams Runeterra's forests, cultivating life everywhere he goes. He knows the secrets of the natural world, and holds deep friendships with all things that grow...
allytips: Try to help allies follow up a good Rootcaller hit with Triggerseed!
Use Brushmaker to set up future ambush spots!
Daisy can block skillshots and slow down enemies. Use her to peel for your teammates!
enemytips: Ivern can be deceptively slippery. Be careful chasing him too far.
Ivern's brush has a long duration. Watch out for ambushes!
Be careful when fighting Ivern alone if he has Daisy ready to help!

spells.name: Rootcaller
spells.description: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.
spells.tooltip: Ivern conjures a vine dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Rooting</status> the first enemy hit for {{ e1 }} seconds. Allies that Attack a <status>Rooted</status> enemy dash into attack range.

spells.name: Brushmaker
spells.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: While in brush and for 3 seconds after leaving it Ivern's Attacks deal an additional {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Active: Ivern grows a patch of Brush for {{ e1 }} seconds and reveals it for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Triggerseed
spells.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
spells.tooltip: Ivern grants <shield>{{ totalshield }} Shield</shield> to an ally champion. After 2 seconds, it bursts, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Daisy!
spells.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
spells.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy for {{ f6 }} seconds. If Daisy Attacks the same champion three consecutive times she creates a shockwave, dealing {{ totaldaisyad }} magic damage and Knocking Up enemies for 1 second (3s Cooldown).

Daisy has:
{{ totaldaisyhp }} Health
{{ totalbonusresists }} Armor
{{ totalbonusresists }} Magic Resist
{{ totaldaisyad }} Attack Damage

Recast: Manually issue orders to Daisy.

label: Cooldown
Daisy's Base Health
Daisy's Base Armor And Magic Resist
Daisy Bonus Attack Speed

passive.name: Friend of the Forest
passive.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.
